name: I'm A Wizard, and...
description:
YOU ARE A WIZARD

And you are ready to **** things up.

Controls:

WASD: Move
Hotkeys (1-9) OR Mouse click: Select/Deselect Spell
Click anywhere with a spell selected: Cast Spell
Z: Activate Wizard Vision
C: Zoom Out/In
U: Reset Level
ESC: Pause, and show menu.

There are 7 spells around the arena. Each **** up the world in their own way, shown by the yellow cards around the map.

Around the arena, there are enemies, but they are pretty big pushovers (literally).

This is just a sandbox that allows you to play around with some fun abilities in an arena full of stuff. Have Fun!

** EPILEPSY WARNING **
(Don't use Wizard Vision OR Giant Bomb Spell if susceptible to seizures)

SPOILERS:

Spells:

Fireball: Sets target on fire.
Freeze: Freeze target.
Transform Object: Turns target into another random object
Rotate Object: Rotates object randomly
Scale Object: Scales object randomly
Push Object: Pushes an object randomly
Giant Bomb: DROP A BOMB ON IT
